channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP NetWeaver System Landscape Directory, LM-Core

item.title: CVE-2018-2368|2024-08-05T04:14:39.708Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20netweaver%20system%20landscape%20directory%2C%20lm-core
item.description: SAP NetWeaver System Landscape Directory, LM-CORE 7.10, 7.20, 7.30, 7.31, 7.40, does not perform any authentication checks for functionalities that require user identity.
